text:
Hi @everyone!

*Just under 2 weeks left of our programme* 
:grin::flushed::scream:
We wrap up our E-Mentoring programme on Fri 1st Dec, so be sure to make the most of your E-Mentors!

:point_right:*This could be your last chance to enjoy relaxed, unbiased and frank conversation with real employers before you enter the workforce*. Ask all of those _juicy_ questions about work life that you've wanted to know as well as soak up the tips and secrets that your E-Mentors have learned throughout their years of experience! 

Take full advantage of having your E-Mentors whilst they are still ready and waiting to help you through the Prospela platform!
:muscle::muscle:
